processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimal Processing, some materials remain in original file folders and boxes.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains bursar reports, expenditures, financial summaries, monthly reports, and budgets.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Title varies: Report, Annual report, Financial statement, Manager's report and 1962/1963 Annual report of the Director of the Budget and Special Services.

Made up of reports from Assistant Business Manager, Bursar, Personnel Supervisor, Librarian, Publications Office and the administrators of various auxiliary services and actions taken by the Board of Scientific Directors and the Board of Trustees.

Includes endowments and additions to endowments; grants reports on changes in personnel and scientific staff, welfare service and Workmen's Compensation. Includes reports on improvements and. construction in buildings and grounds and new property under construction. Includes Annual reports of Press, Journals, Library, Bursar's reports of receipts, expenditures and valuations paged in separately for each year including yearly valuation schedule.
Various charts showing growth, distribution of expenditures, increases in mailing lists of Journals and Studies. Many photographs of buildings and interiors of buildings.

Starting 1956/1957 includes Budget authorizations and expenditures.Title varies: Report, Annual report, Financial statement, Manager's report and 1962/1963 Annual report of the Director of the Budget and Special Services.

Made up of reports from Assistant Business Manager, Bursar, Personnel Supervisor, Librarian, Publications Office and the administrators of various auxiliary services and actions taken by the Board of Scientific Directors and the Board of Trustees.

Includes endowments and additions to endowments; grants reports on changes in personnel and scientific staff, welfare service and Workmen's Compensation. Includes reports on improvements and. construction in buildings and grounds and new property under construction. Includes Annual reports of Press, Journals, Library, Bursar's reports of receipts, expenditures and valuations paged in separately for each year including yearly valuation schedule.
Various charts showing growth, distribution of expenditures, increases in mailing lists of Journals and Studies. Many photographs of buildings and interiors of buildings.
Starting 1956/1957 includes Budget authorizations and expenditures.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Restricted from scholary access pending further processsing. Material 25 years old or older will be available for scholarly research once processing is completed.
